description:
360 degree Rooftop with Central Park and water views, Elevator/Doorman Building in the heart of Lincoln Center.  Quick walk to Columbus Circle, Central Park, Restaurants/Bars, Beacon Theatre.  Subway station is one block away.
1 bedroom and living area with sectional/pull out couch.
I have a ton of recommendations for bars, restaurants and leisurely things to do around NYC.  Times Square is also one stop away and Madison Square Garden is 2 stops away.  Feel free to contact me!
name: COZY, SPACIOUS 1 BR APARTMENT IN LINCOLN CENTER
review: Great central location, close to good food and lots of transportation options. Clean and convenient.
